item.description:
Join members of the Digital Arts group from 7:30 to 9:00 pm, for networking, food and drink, and an
informal discussion about the art. I plan to discuss our group's goals and objectives and hope you will share your ideas for future meetup events.

Please submit payment through Paypal when you sign up. To reduce no-shows, the $5 fee will not be refunded unless the organizer cancels the event due to low participation or bad weather. Please be sure you can attend before you RSVP. The $5 donation will help cover for the meetup administration fee I pay as the organizer. If you would like to send a check instead, please contact the organizer for the mailing address.

All members are welcome I look forward to seeing you there!

group.name: The Boston Digital Arts Meetup Group

item.name: Trident Dinner and Networking
